text: Motion
Motion
Motion
By the way, did the embroidery go well?

Ah, yes.
Thanks to you, it's finished.

That's good. Lessons went smoothly too,
everything's going well.
Hehe, thank you very much.

Come to think of it, I didn't ask,
what were you embroidering?
—I was adding a pattern to a new handkerchief.

...I'll give it to you now.
Here you go, Producer-san.

...Huh?
For me?

Yes. Actually,
that was my intention from the beginning.
Hehe, it turned into a little surprise, didn't it?

Ah, yeah, it did surprise me, but...
Thanks, Chiyuki.

It's a beautiful pattern...
Are these leaves here?
Yes, that part was improvised.

Oh, I can't really tell,
but it looks really harmonious and nice.

Oh, could it be that idea
you mentioned back then was──

...I casually noticed that it's always close by,
kind of like Producer-san.
I'm sorry if that was rude...

Haha, not at all.
You expressed what you felt, that's all.
